description: 'UI Toast' has been renamed to 'UI Notification' in Dashboard 2.0, but most of the functionality is identical.

properties.notes: As countdown timer will also now show as part of the top border of the notification.
Instead of now just defining a single 'border' colour, the 'highlight' is used on the left-side of the notification.
Permits the injection fo raw HTML and JS content into the widgets.

new_properties.notes: Defines whether the notification can be manually dismissed, or not.
When a timer is provided, if this is trye, it will show a decreasing coloured bar across the top of the Dashboard's modal.
